item.title: Saba add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "(What are your ghosts like?) (They are on the insides of the lids of my eyes.) (This is also where my ghosts reside.) (You have ghosts?) (Of course I have ghosts.) (But you are a child.) (I am not a child.) (But you have not known love.) (These are my ghosts, the spaces amid love.)" -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Saba add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "I'm not so weird to me." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Saba add a quote by Elizabeth Bishop
item.description: "--Even losing you (a joking voice, a gesture/ I love) I shan't have lied. It's evident/ the art of losing's not too hard to master/ though it may look like (Write it!) like disaster." -- Elizabeth Bishop
